NO_FILTERS: You don't have any filters registered yet.
DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to remove the {{name}} filter?
NO_GOBACK: No, I want to go back to the list

ARGS.YEAR: Year of release of the game or anime
ARGS.IS_OFFICIAL: Does the music have to be official?
ARGS.IS_FAMOUS: Does the music have to be known?
ARGS.DURATION_GT: The music must last more than: (in seconds)
ARGS.DURATION_LT: The music must last less than: (in seconds)
